cross: Cattleya sincorana f. coerulea 'SVO' x Cattleya walkeriana f. coerulea 'Wenzell Son'

measurements.description: Two flat flowers on one 4.0-cm inflorescence; sepals and petals light lavender; lip white, distal half including side lobes lavender, dark lavender veins, light yellow centrally; column white blushed light lavender; substance firm; texture diamond dust.

corrections.reason: Updated to reflect actual source page URL structure (YYMMDD/awardNum.html)
